item.title: 2025.12.09 // art shop open, (5) new logs in /jfashion/closet
item.description:
added 5 closet database logs in /jfashion/.

/art/ shop.html is active, and links to the long-trusted ko-fi store i use to file all orders.

item.title: 2025.12.01 // (8) new logs in /jfashion/ closet database
item.description:
added 8 closet database logs. not finished, but as the site updates every item will have a unique page.

depreciated the microlog due to neglect.

item.title: 2025.11.26 // kimokawaii @ conroe booth debut date
item.description:
i'm confirmed to set up booth at conroe tx @ kimokawaii for the entire first weekend of june 2026. streets say it's very popular with the local sweet lolita scene, so i'm happy to land a spot.

added a global widget to keep track of upcoming booth locations at conventions or markets on the front page and a select few subs. the landing page should look much fuller now.

item.title: 2025.11.25 // added "order of burger and frills" to /art/, new gallery widget
item.description:
added "order of burger and frills" to /art/ and /pierrotbuckshot/

added global widget to display new additions in /art/gallery.html on the front page

item.title: 2025.11.19 // added "jax peel" and other older works to /art/
item.description:
added "jax peel" and other older works to /art/

added new pieces to closet.html in /jfashion/

optimized media and /art/ media pages.

item.title: 2025.11.17 // link to "pierrot buckshot" with its new badge
item.description: show off this badge to let others know the best ship of the amazing digital circus (which is pomjax of course). the code allows other webmasters to link to my fansite, and iis available on the lefthand side of the pbs page.

item.title: 2025.11.15 // 100 questions for webmasters
item.description: added post "100 questions for webmasters" in /log/ under personal log. repost of mousecky's original questionnaire form.

item.title: 2025.11.09 // illustration posted
item.description: added the piece "funny (bunny^2) suits". crossposted between /pierrotbuckshot/ and /art/.

item.title: 2025.11.06 // shrinelist, "PIERROT BUCKSHOT", "SLATESHIPPING"
item.description:
shrinelist shows up in global sitemaps.

SLATESHIPPING - formerly the luchino shrine, slateshipping refers to the identity v ship between norton campbell and luchino diruse and showcases any of my fanwork with both or either characters. subpage count: 7.

PIERROT BUCKSHOT - the new addition, inspired by a ship from the amazing digital circus between pomni and jax. subpage count: 8.

global spreadsheet + script optimization,

item.title: 2025.08.23 // photo album moved to microlog
item.description:
i don't enjoy demolishing files on a whim but i've grazed off /jfashion/photoalbum.html and moved all contents to a new directory /microlog/

i didn't like how the microlog was hidden behind two links, but i also didn't feel like manually copying each microlog entry into RSS to remind everyone where it was (it's too many logs to keep track of longterm.) so it's front and center on the landing page.

item.title: 2025.07.22 // post-delta_h_con jfashion entries
item.description: back from some IRL events. new microblog format in /jfashion/photoalbum.html as well as a hefty photodump from said events. i've accumulated a clothing haul from them as well, featured in /jfashion/closet.html.

item.title: 2025.06.29 // official page badge. get linking!
item.description: cobbled together an 88 x 31 badge.

item.title: 2025.06.23 // guestbook open
item.description: feel free to exchange links, share stuff you think i'd be interested in, or simply write kind words.

item.title: 2025.06.02 // visitors of sidbury bank
item.description: new blogpost redeeming my bragging rights in idv's costume gacha.

item.title: 2025.05.27 // tokyo x @ nrg center confirmed
item.description:
sorry for the radio silence everyone. i can officially announce that I'll be attending tokyo x@ nrg park in houston, tx as a vendor.

[nortluchi] itabag is available.

item.title: 2025.04.06 // quitter's park: twitch stream
item.description:
i've been silent streaming on twitch and it's been a very repairing experience to directly chat with followers and friends. although they come and go in small numbers with large periods of silence inbetween, i get to host a space where i can share my music tastes and I've merged a little closer into my established community.

i whipped up an onsite mount to watch my streams from. drop by 2pm - 4am cst and chat with me.

item.title: 2025.02.19 // luchino fansite update
item.description: the luchino fansite braces a new layout theme along with new subsections, "music playlist," and "merchandise i collected."

item.title: 2025.02.10 // "Why You Should Make A Website"
item.description: rehashing the collapse of the centric web and how web design plays a part in the scam. building healthy habits such as migrating to independent platforms and building a website might help you.

item.title: 2025.02.06 // "Refléter Op. 6", RSS feed applied
item.description:
several graphic changes were applied to the site and some directories were recategorized for the following update. i've set up two rss feeds respectively for my personal blog and store. the landing page will now display the newest posts of both feeds.

posted an identity v fanfiction "Refléter Op. 6" that i've written some time ago in personal log > fanfiction.

item.title: 2024.12.22 // spreadsheet redeco
item.description: touched up the music page and sorted my spreadsheet archive to be used globally rather than page by page. cleaned up luchino's shrine.

item.title: 2024.09.06 // church of luchino
item.description: edited on 2025.2.6. date of when the church of luchino was published.

item.title: 2024.08.24 // general website-itry
item.description: site changes are officially being recorded... i might have waited too long to do this ever since the host switch. a brand new sitewide layout graphic has been applied for the special occasion, but i'll keep using the old one for the blog. regarding ko-fi i've come across issues with overseas sales, so i'll issue a list of countries i can't ship to internationally in the upcoming commission TOS.
